hero.subtitle: Next Gen Digital Life Economy
hero.desc: Where KOL influence is minted as tradable assets. We use AI and Blockchain to give digital identity autonomous life and economic value.

whitepaper.title: KMT Ecosystem Whitepaper
whitepaper.subtitle: The Economic Engine of Digital Life
whitepaper.intro: KOL Market Token (KMT) is the governance and utility token of the KOLMarket ecosystem, designed to capture the value of digital life creation and interaction.
whitepaper.burn_desc: We implement a rigorous 'Proof of Burn' strategy where protocol revenue is used to buy back and burn KMT, ensuring long-term value appreciation.
whitepaper.solana_desc: Leveraging Solana's high throughput and low latency to enable real-time micro-transactions for AI agents.
